pages.text: By combining sanguinite with some purified souls, and a large amount of LP from a tier 6 blood orb, I have managed to create a powerful lock, able to bind nearly any item to the soul of the holder.$(br2)Using it is rather simple, just putting both the item I want to soulbind and the lock itself into a crafting grid will suffice.
I am not totally sure what this soulbinding does however. Some say that it 'lets you keep the item through death', but that doesnt make sense. Isn't death a permanent thing?
